tag_list: open-source-crm-erp-system, accounting, project-management, invoice, order, offer
overview:
A comprehensive CRM / ERP solution

Easy to Use Inexperienced user in a few hours become familary with EBI Neutrino, which allow them from the beginning to be effective in their work.

Scalable Application

EBI Neutrino is a CRM / ERP System, from the beginning scheduled to be adaptable on your business dynamically.

Portable

The system is usable in different platform like Windows, Linux, Mac OS, Solaris and Unix with the same result, productivity.

New Apps structure

The version 5.0 is extendable via a simple xml and groovy apps script at runtime.

web_presences.title: EBI Neutrino Open Source CRM ERP System
